website_summaries.verdict: Translates 55 languages and understands 75+ accents, and even has photo translation capabilities. Pricey, but well-liked among those who travel for business to Asia.
pros: Works with WiFi hotspots, personal hotspot, SIM cards, and for-purchase data plans
Ideal for reading foreign signs and menus with photo translation
Operates well in noisy environments thanks to noise-cancelling technology
Large screen and buttons are easy to navigate
cons: Needs several attempts to translate certain phrases correctly, though it’s still imperfect

customer_reviews.title: Expected a better product for the money.
customer_reviews.text: The translations are more often inaccurate and the translator often takes several attempts to even obtain a poor translation, Regardless of what is advertised the translator is almost totally dependent on wifi for Mandarin Chinese.I am disappointed overall.I have not used the hotspot yet.......I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: William F Metcalf

customer_reviews.title: What a neat translator
customer_reviews.text: This is a properly designed "smart" translator, it not only translates through voice but also translates via the camera. And you can use it as a 3/4G hotspot when traveling. My personal favorite function is "menu translation", easy to avoid some embarrassing moments when sitting in a restaurant but could not recognize the dishes. There are some small "bugs" during the uses but I think they will be fixed through the software upgrade...
customer_reviews.author: Wenxuan Dong

customer_reviews.title: Extremely helpful in Japan, also with Polish language with family.
customer_reviews.text: This translator was incredibly useful for us (Americans) in Japan! Especially with the take-a-picture-to-translate function. Also, my Polish family was in town and my husband does not speak Polish... it helped his communicate with my Aunts that would not have otherwise been possible. I gave it 4/5 stars for the accuracy portion, as the English-to-Polish did have a few errors... though I will admit Polish is an extremely difficult language. Overall 5/5 stars based on how much it helped us, anyways! Would highly recommend! I also used it to help refresh my memory on some Polish, could be really helpful to someone learning a language.
customer_reviews.author: Camille

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this translator in Hong Kong. It works pretty well translating English to Cantonese. It is not 100% accurate but overall is very impressive. The best part is that it can connect to 4G at only $1.6/day and saves my money purchasing SIM card. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: This is life changing
customer_reviews.text: I travel frequently and bought this product and love it. I am retired and travel alone. I now am never worried about communicating in any country. Plus I had some questions and the company was very diligent about responding. Worth the money plu
customer_reviews.author: vmm

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately it did not work
customer_reviews.text: Was super excited as I travel monthly, could not get this to work in China, who knows what I said to the cab driver one day but it was not good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I used this on a trip to Europe and it worked great. I used it a lot for learning Spanish and Italian. It recently stopped charging and will not turn on after using for just 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Duke 6

customer_reviews.title: It’s easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my sister. She only uses it for English since she is Spanish speaking only. It has too many languages but no need for them.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalina Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: A helpful pocket device
customer_reviews.text: The translator is a very good device. Small and easy to carry in your pocket. I found it very very useful to use at my hotel on a recent trip. However, since i did not have wifi connection or hot spots, i was unable to use it when i needed it the most, while i was out on tours, at restaurant, shopping and trying to get directions.
customer_reviews.author: Charming Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Great Device...Well Worth the Price Tag
customer_reviews.text: I like the sleek design and feel of it. It’s very easy to use and I’ve used it on a recent trip to Senegal where French is spoken! An added plus is that my 14 yr old daughter uses it to help her with Spanish
customer_reviews.author: D Prescott

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money, JoneR stays in touch for your satisfaction.
customer_reviews.text: Had no trouble connecting to the 2 year global voice only data plan. Everything works as advertised. No troubles so far. Paul j. Baran 408 manning ave. Mckeesport, Pa. 15132 (free case and lanyard)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No history replay
customer_reviews.text: Better than phone apps. No finding app and waiting for it to load. Seems like it would save phone power too being a separate device. I only wish the history would replay to save even more time when you’re rushing around, otherwise I don’t see a point to it. For this I take off 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Pepmiller

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like it . Would recommend it. Pretty accurate. I wish it could translate the tv
customer_reviews.author: Alena H.

customer_reviews.title: More accurate than Google Translate.
customer_reviews.text: Picture of text translation is pretty cool, and surprisingly accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan K

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend this.
customer_reviews.text: This results from this translator are far from perfect. My fiance speaks French, and he tested this machine and he thought that this translator would only accurate when translating very simple sentences or phrases. He wouldn’t recommend it for the translation of important documents or email that needs to be understood properly. It could lead to misunderstanding. I am returning this because it doesn't serve my purpose of purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Scarlet

customer_reviews.title: Renewed review!
customer_reviews.text: I made an earlier review out of frustration and it was pretty negative. I was able to connect with a person who walked me through the global network settings and I was successful in Setting up the Translator and would like to change my review. This works very well for my needs at my job and is well worth purchasing. My only negative input at this point is off-line connection with languages that need to encompass widely used languages such as Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: rasmusicman

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It can translate basic sentences with efficiency. It has an object identifier and photograph identifier for signs or instructions. Covers 55 languages. Very portable. Cons: More complex sentences are often inaccurate. Takes some time to figure out the controls. Interface isn't always responsive. Only works while connected to WiFi or SIM. Where is the two year unlimited global data?
customer_reviews.author: Brojo Pasai

customer_reviews.title: Cannot change display to English.
customer_reviews.text: For the life of me, I cannot figure out how to change the display to English. It defaulted in an Asian language. This is very frustrating. Manual is useless as it doesn’t address this problem. Can anyone help?
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to use and it is very accurate not like apps I have gotten
customer_reviews.author: Brice W. Boatwright

customer_reviews.title: Great to teach yourself a language
customer_reviews.text: I am not able right now to travel, which is why we bought the device. So using it now to teach myself a language
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: JoneR Voice Language Translator Device, 2-Year Unlimited Global Data, Support Photo Translation, 3.1-inch Touch Screen, 55 Languages +75 Accents Instant Two-Way Portable Translator, Fly, White
feature_bullets: 【LIMITED OFFER: 2-year FREE Unlimited Built in Global Data】No need for WiFi/SIM card. The built-in data plan will give you network access (for 'Voice Translation' ONLY) in 85 countries for 2 years. Other functions require normal network connection.【Please contact seller for redeem code】

【Wide Coverage of 200+ countries & Offline Translation for English-Chinese】Empowered by world-leading AI technology and deep learning algorithm, JoneR translator is optimized for real-time two-way voice translation between 55 languages and can recognize 75 regional accents in less than 1 sec with over 98% accuracy. Offline translation is available between English-Chinese (no network required).

【Photo Translation for 15 Languages】Equipped with a 13 megapixels camera and OCR recognition technology, JoneR translator can help you understand foreign signs /instructions / maps / menus / documents in 15 languages simply by taking a photo and recognize.

【Multiple Ways to Go Online & Global WiFi Hotspot】JoneR FLY supports 4 ways of networking: WiFi, Personal Hotspot, SIM card and Global WiFi data plan for 85 countries purchasable on the device which you can share hotspot with up to 5 of your devices.

【Noise Cancelling Mics & Easy-to-Read Design】4 noise-cancelling microphones enables JoneR translator to work perfectly in noisy environment. With the 3.1-inch large screen, the translation result is easy to read, especially for elders, and can be displayed reversely to the other.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars51 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
